preqs: BTF1010 or BTP1010. No prerequisite for students enrolled in B2012 Bachelor of Business Specialist and Bachelor of Arts or B2018 Bachelor of Business Specialist and Bachelor of Information Technology.

description: The legal framework which operates in relation to marketing decisions and practice. Topics discussed include unfair trading practices, intellectual property rights (patents, trade marks, copyright and designs), anti-competitive conduct and new marketing practices. The unit places the laws  controlling unfair and anti-competitive practices within the wider economic context.
